WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I was testing the features of CRM 2013 and observed that Async scripts are not working in XRMToolkit.
 Did the script upgrade to support CRM 2013?
WorkItem.Summary: Having issues with async calls with CRM 2013.

Comments.Message:
Hi.

I currently have no access to CRM 2013. The toolkit has not been updated to work with CRM 2013 yet.

Regards,
Jaimie

Hi Jaimie,

You can download a CRM 2013 RC1 VM from here: http://connect.microsoft.com/site687/Downloads/DownloadDetails.aspx?DownloadID=51174.

In the same site you can get the CRM 2013 RC1 bits too.

I guess your company need to sign in for the trial in order to get access to that site.

Regards,

Luiz

Hi There.

Thanks for the information. I have used CRM 2013 RTM and released a beta version for CRM 2013

for more details, 

https://xrmservicetoolkit.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=CRM%202013%20Support%20and%20Development

Regards
Jaimie
